languages.text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.
languages.original_text:
С помощью {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятия{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативник{/g} пытается найти и использовать уязвимые места в обороне противника. Сдержать такой натиск практически невозможно.
Ключевые особенности: точные одиночные атаки, пробитие защиты, негативные эффекты по области, статичная позиция для стрельбы.

traits.locale_text:
An Adept uses Intelligence and Perception to find and exploit weaknesses in the enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Adept.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

An Adept uses Intelligence and Perception to find and exploit weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Adept.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

Ключевые особенности: точные одиночные атаки, пробитие защиты, негативные эффекты по области, статичная позиция для стрельбы.

An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
С помощью Интеллекта и Восприятия адепт пытается найти и использовать уязвимые места в обороне противника. Сдержать такой натиск практически невозможно.
Ключевые особенности: точные одиночные атаки, пробитие защиты, негативные эффекты по области, статичная позиция для стрельбы.

С помощью Интеллекта и Восприятия адепт пытается найти и использовать уязвимые места в обороне противника. Сдержать такой натиск практически невозможно.
Ключевые особенности: точные одиночные атаки, пробитие защиты, негативные эффекты по области, статичная позиция для стрельбы.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}拥有出色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}敌人来找到敌人的防御弱点。没有任何敌人可以抵挡特工的攻击。
核心：精准单体攻击、防御穿透、区域弱化、阵地射击。
languages.original_text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
技师拥有出色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}，可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}敌人来找到敌人的防御弱点。没有任何敌人可以抵挡技师的{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}。
核心：精准单体攻击、防御穿透、区域弱化、阵地射击。

languages.text:
Un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} usa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} para encontrar y explotar {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} en las defensas enemigas. Nadie resiste a los ataques de un agente.
Enfoque central: ataques individuales precisos, penetración de defensas, debilitamiento de área y posición de disparo consistente.
languages.original_text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
Un agente usa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} para encontrar y explotar {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidades{/g} en las defensas enemigas. Nadie resiste a los ataques de un agente.
Enfoque central: ataques individuales precisos, penetración de defensas, debilitamiento de área y posición de disparo consistente.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}を用いて、敵の防衛の弱点を見つけて{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}する。オペレーターの攻撃に抵抗することは誰もできない。
コアフォーカス：精密な単一攻撃、防衛貫通、範囲内デバフ、安定した射撃体勢。
languages.original_text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
アデプトが{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}知覚{/g}を用いて、敵の防衛の弱点を見つけて{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}する。アデプトの{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}に抵抗することは誰もできない。
コアフォーカス：精密な単一攻撃、防衛貫通、範囲内デバフ、安定した射撃体勢。

languages.text:
Ein {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agent{/g} nutzt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, um Schwächen in der feindlichen Verteidigung {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}auszunutzen{/g}. Niemand kann dem Angriff eines Agenten widerstehen.
Hauptfokus: Präzise Einzelangriffe, Verteidigungsdurchdringung, Flächenschwächungen, durchgängige Feuerposition.
languages.original_text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
Ein Agent nutzt {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}, um Schwächen in der feindlichen Verteidigung {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}auszunutzen{/g}. Niemand kann dem Angriff eines Agenten widerstehen.
Hauptfokus: Präzise Einzelangriffe, Verteidigungsdurchdringung, Flächenschwächungen, durchgängige Feuerposition.

languages.text: Un {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agent{/g} utilise l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} pour trouver et exploiter les {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilités{/g} des défenses ennemies. Aucun ennemi ne peut résister aux attaques d'un agent. Points forts : attaques ponctuelles précises, pénétration des défenses, malus de zone, position de tir cohérente.
languages.original_text:
An {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} uses {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} to find and {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} weaknesses in an enemy's defences. None can withstand an attack from an Operative.
Core focus: precise single attacks, defence penetration, area debuffs, consistent firing position.

traits.locale_text:
Un Adepte utilise l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} pour trouver et {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploiter{/g} les points faibles des défenses ennemies. Aucun ennemi ne peut résister aux {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaques{/g} d'un Adepte.
Points forts : attaques ponctuelles précises, pénétration des défenses, débuffs de zone, position de tir cohérente.
